name: Squirble Jump
description: This is a plat-former on the Nintendo Game Boy Color. You play as a squirrel named Squirble, who is tasked with finding the "Legendary Lemon" at the top of the game. There are lots of unique and difficult levels that Squirble can navigate. Find all of the different and hidden skins you can play with! There are some secret levels that can give you extra rewards and lore. Who is Squirble? Why is he tasked with finding the Legendary Lemon? Is somebody controlling the main character against his will?! Maybe you'll find out if you beat the game...
